name: Meegah Mem II: Shareware Edition
description:
Meegah Mem 2 (stylized Meegah Mem II) is a parody of Mega Man 2 that improves upon its predecessor, Meegah Mem, with a new engine, new mechanics and more! This is a Shareware Demo - this means that you can share it with your friends over USB, SD card, or whatever so they don't have to download it. Feel free to distribute!

Features:

  • Crappy paint graphics!
  • Dumb designs!
  • New game engine! (with variable jump height!)
  • Only a little bit completely broken!
  • 3 "robat mestrs"! Three levels!
  • Arbitrarily high difficulty!
  • Oh, yeah, did I mention abhorrent grammar?

This version will not be updated further. A full release will come hopefully around 2020, but, to be honest, I have no idea when. Have fun!
